Description: Tombstone; carved sandstone, with 9 line Kufic inscription referring to Fatima, daughter of Ja'far, who died in AH 412 (AD 1021).
Bibliographic references: Wright 1887 / Kufic Tombstones in the British Museum (4)
Porter 2003 / Mightier than the sword: Arabic script - beauty and meaning (6)
Fluck et al. 2015 / Egypt: Faith after the Pharaohs (p.245)
Porter & Barakat 2004 / Mightier than the Sword: Arabic Script: Beauty and Meaning (17)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2015, Oct 29 – 2016, Feb 7. British Museum, Room 35. Egypt: Faith after the Pharaohs. 2015 1 April - 15 Sept. Berlin, Bode Museum, 'EIN GOTT - Abrahams Erben am Nil' 2004 7 Jan-7 Apr, Kuala Lumpur, Islamic Arts Museum Malaysia, 'Mightier than the Sword' 2003 22 Mar-25 May, University of Melbourne, Ian Potter Museum of Art, 'Mightier than the Sword'
Acquisition name: Purchased through: Sir Ernest A T Wallis Budge
